title: 'The White Lotus' Premiere and Mailbag Questions
description:
Chris and Andy discuss the premiere of HBO’s new show 'The White Lotus.' Then they answer some listener mailbag questions, including one about their top three favorite episodes of television (33:04).

Hosts: Andy Greenwald and Chris Ryan
Production Assistant: Isaiah Blakely
